ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 19
ygData.msgSnippet: With the 2nd best DD spells and the best pets... I hope magicians are seen as more than a grocery store. Im only in the 20s, but so far.. I seem to be able to
ygData.messageBody:
With the 2nd best DD spells and the best pets... I hope magicians are seen
as more than a grocery store.

Im only in the 20s, but so far.. I seem to be able to out damage (more
efficient) my wizard. We just don't get to cast those nifty travel spells.

I also play a Wizard. I enjoy it as well and.. I do like root.. but would
trade it any day for a good pet. My magician only does abt 10% less damage
with the DD spells (which the pet more than makes up for) but I do like
those great bolt spells also. Just hate it when someone walks in front of
it...



- Magician is support ( food, bandages, heatstone etc )and (now
> reinforced) pet
> man.
>
